titulo: Novels in Spanish: EL Ultimo Poema: Easy Short Novels in Spanish for Intermediate Level Speakers: Easy Stories to Practice Your Spanish nº 2
descripcion:
Learn Spanish by listening to this short story.
Now you can Learn Spanish with short stories specially designed to help you learn Spanish using vocabulary that you can actually use every day. This short novel is written in easy Spanish because it is not as complex as some books written to win literature contests. This will make it easier to understand Spanish. So stop wasting time in any old books with phrases that are either difficult to understand or unlikely to ever find good use for, as are found in much of the old Spanish literature. Aimed at people who want to learn Spanish by listening, this book will help you improve comprehension and familiarize yourself with unique expressions in Spanish. 
Written by a real Spanish writer, El Ultimo Poema is a story that introduces new vocabulary, and it is easy to follow. It makes it easy to practice all of the tenses and moods in Spanish. This book is certainly better than practicing with a small child's book. It is a quick listen that freshens up your Spanish with high frequency vocabulary and structures.
